summary: This was my first inverted color art. I made this when I was on the 11th grade, I think? The first pic is the original, and the...
caption:
This was my first inverted color art. I made this when I was on the 11th grade, I think? The first pic is the original, and the second is how it’ll look when you invert the color.

Using Expressionist Oil Pastel on sketch pad

summary: Updated commission sheet!  Email: COMICFOX12@GMAIL.COM What I will draw: Fanart  Original Characters  Furries  Animals  Ships ...
caption:
Updated commission sheet! 

Email: COMICFOX12@GMAIL.COM

What I will draw:

  • Fanart
  • Original Characters
  • Furries
  • Animals
  • Ships

What I will not draw:

  • NSFW
  • Gore 
  • Mecha

(I reserve the right to decline any commission request!)

  • Adding another character will cost double (EX: A complex ship piece will be $100)
  • All Commissions will be done through paypal
  • I accept USD for currency
  • Please include reference pictures! I work far better with those! Any type of reference works!
  • I will draw from different fandoms!

Any and all questions about commissions can be done through my tumblr, via ask or IM. Commission discussion between me and a client will be done through email ONLY. (I will send invoices!)

Email: COMICFOX12@GMAIL.COM

blog.name: kolajmag
blog.title: Kolaj Magazine
blog.description: a quarterly, printed magazine about contemporary collage.

summary: Kolaj Fest New Orleans is a multi-day festival and symposium about contemporary collage and its role in art, culture, and...
caption:
Kolaj Fest New Orleans is a multi-day festival and symposium about contemporary collage and its role in art, culture, and society, July 12-15, 2018. Learn more, see an overview of the program, and register to attend

MAIN EVENT SITE | FAQ | PROGRAM | REGISTER NOW

AT KOLAJ FEST NEW ORLEANS

ARTIST SPOTLIGHT

Charles Wilkin & Collage Fortunes

“Charles Wilkin has done for collage what Andy Warhol did for screen printing,” said Kolaj Magazine Editor Ric Kasini Kadour. “That is to say, he took a relatively obscure art medium and showed us how powerful a tool it can be.” In addition to being featured at one of Kolaj Fest New Orleans’ Daily Collage Congresses, Wilkin will conduct “Fortune Collage Project, The Perceptive Reading of Paper Scraps.” In this performative art piece, the artist makes a spontaneous collage using materials selected by a participant. MORE

Early Registration ends June 9th

A limited number of Early Registrations are now available for those who want to lock in their registration at a reduced rate of $75. REGISTER NOW

tags: you dont have to donate but
again- im not in crisis- but i am not getting the hours i need at work
summary: I’m not scheduled to work this week at my job, my boss hasn’t even started my transfer I don’t think, and I’ve been applying to...
body:
I’m not scheduled to work this week at my job, my boss hasn’t even started my transfer I don’t think, and I’ve been applying to other jobs in the area I’ll be moving to.

And I’m moving very soon.


I’m not in an emergency state but I’m worried and anxious

If you could help by commissioning me, my sketches are 10$.

It would help me out a lot in getting gas and food- or even keep my bank from taking insuffiecnt funds fees at the very very least.

If you’d like to donate a buck or two here’s my paypal | kofi

reblog.comment:

summary: So my dad passed away when I was 3 months old didn't really have but one other picture of him and my mom has that but I was...
